languages.text: "За языком следи, а то вдруг кто услышит, что ты на Лорд-капитана напраслину возводишь..."

traits.locale_text: "За языком следи, а то вдруг кто услышит, что ты на Лорд-капитана напраслину возводишь..."

languages.text: "Oi, watch your mouth before someone hears you slandering the Lord Captain..."
languages.original_text: "За языком следи, а то вдруг кто услышит, что ты на Лорд-капитана напраслину возводишь..."

traits.locale_text: "Oi, watch your mouth before someone hears you slandering the Lord Captain..."
"Oi, watch your mouth before someone hears you slandering the Lord Captain..."
"Oi, watch your mouth before someone hears you slandering the Lord Captain..."
"Oi, watch your mouth before someone hears you slandering the Lord Captain..."
"Oi, watch your mouth before someone hears you slandering the Lord Captain..."
"Oi, watch your mouth before someone hears you slandering the Lord Captain..."

languages.text: « Hé, tenez votre langue avant que quelqu'un vous entende calomnier {mf|le|la} libre-{mf|marchand|marchande} ! »
languages.original_text: "Oi, watch your mouth before someone hears you slandering the Lord Captain..."

traits.locale_text: « Hé, tenez votre langue avant que quelqu'un vous entende calomnier {mf|le|la} libre-{mf|marchand|marchande} ! »

languages.text: “喂，说话注意点！免得有人听到你在诋毁领主舰长……”
languages.original_text: "Oi, watch your mouth before someone hears you slandering the Lord Captain..."

traits.locale_text: “喂，说话注意点！免得有人听到你在诋毁领主舰长……”

languages.text: "Oi, passt lieber auf, was Ihr sagt, bevor noch jemand glaubt, Ihr würdet den Lord Captain verleumden ..."
languages.original_text: "Oi, watch your mouth before someone hears you slandering the Lord Captain..."

traits.locale_text: "Oi, passt lieber auf, was Ihr sagt, bevor noch jemand glaubt, Ihr würdet den Lord Captain verleumden ..."

languages.text: «Eh, contrólate, alguien puede oírte difamando sobre {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán...».
languages.original_text: "Oi, watch your mouth before someone hears you slandering the Lord Captain..."

traits.locale_text: «Eh, contrólate, alguien puede oírte difamando sobre {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán...».

languages.text: 「おい、口には気をつけろ。ロード・キャプテンを悪く言ってるのを誰かに聞かれるかもしれないぞ…」
languages.original_text: "Oi, watch your mouth before someone hears you slandering the Lord Captain..."

traits.locale_text: 「おい、口には気をつけろ。ロード・キャプテンを悪く言ってるのを誰かに聞かれるかもしれないぞ…」

languages.text: "Hop, birileri Lord Kaptan'a iftira ettiğini duymadan önce kapa çeneni."
languages.original_text: "Oi, watch your mouth before someone hears you slandering the Lord Captain..."

traits.locale_text: "Hop, birileri Lord Kaptan'a iftira ettiğini duymadan önce kapa çeneni."
